channel.title: Read this if ur starting server VERY HELPFUL!
channel.description:
Hey Guys,
I can help you guys but not with errors or adding thing or major coding but if you want to start a server download a source from [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html[/url] (fr33sc4p2 pkz, pimpscape, phonescape, project 16 are good sources [sources are the files you need to run your server])
then follow this guide [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,37596.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,37596.0.html[/url] [u][glow=red,2,300]BUT[/glow][/u] dont put in what the tuturial says when your editing file "compile.bat" instead clear whats already there and replace it with this: [code]:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: :: :: :: All of the following code is (C) Copywrited 2006-2007, :: :: Grene Penguin Entertainment. :: :: :: ::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
@echo off if exist "C:\Program Files (x86)\" set programfiles=C:\Program Files (x86) set pro=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0 set pro2=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0 set jac=\bin\javac.exe set jav=\bin\java.exe :co1 set b=0 set t=7 goto co2 :co2 color %b%%t% :menu cls title The Perfect Compiler version 1.7 echo Please choose an option below to do that function. echo Keep posted on the Moparscape Tutorials section for echo any updates that I post. echo. echo c - Compile your server. echo r - To Run your server. echo e - To exit out of the program. echo color - Change the Text and Backround colors of this compiler. echo reset - Resets your Compiler Logs. echo. echo. set /p c=Option: if %c%==c goto c if %c%==C goto c if %c%==r goto r if %c%==R goto r if %c%==color goto color if %c%==Color goto color if %c%==COLOR goto color if %c%==reset goto reset if %c%==Reset goto reset if %c%==RESET goto reset if %c%==e goto e if %c%==E goto e if %c%==* goto er goto er :color cls echo Would you like to change the backround color, change echo the text color, or reset it to default? echo. echo back - Change the backround color. echo text - Change the text color. echo def - Change all colors back to default. echo. echo. set /p color=Option: if %color%==back goto back if %color%==BACK goto back if %color%==text goto text if %color%==TEXT goto text if %color%==def goto co1 if %color%==DEF goto co1 if %color%==* goto er goto er :back cls echo Please select a color to change the backround to: echo. echo black echo white echo red echo yellow echo green echo blue echo purple echo. echo. set /p back=Color: if %back%== black (set b=0) if %back%== white (set b=7) if %back%== red (set b=4) if %back%== yellow (set b=6) if %back%== green (set b=2) if %back%== blue (set b=1) if %back%== purple (set b=5) goto co2 :text cls echo Please select a color to change the text to: echo. echo black echo white echo red echo yellow echo green echo blue echo purple echo. echo. set /p back=Color: if %back%== black (set t=0) if %back%== white (set t=7) if %back%== red (set t=4) if %back%== yellow (set t=6) if %back%== green (set t=2) if %back%== blue (set t=1) if %back%== purple (set t=5) goto co2 :c cls title Compiler goto cjc :c2 if exist src (goto cl) else (goto c3) :c3 if exist *.java (goto cl2) else (goto ce) :c4 %javac% -cp . *.java echo Files Compiled Successfully! pause cls goto menu :c5 %javac% -cp . .\src\*.java echo Files Compiled Successfully! pause move .\src\*.class .\classes\ cls goto menu :ce cls echo You need to have Java files for this Compiler to Compile. pause cls goto menu :r cls title Runserver goto cj :r2 set rjava=%java% -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server cls goto r3 :r3 if exist .\classes\server.class (goto sl2) else (goto r4) :r4 if exist .\server.class (goto sl) else (goto se) :r5 %rjava% pause cls goto menu :r6 set rjava= set rjava=%java% -cp .;./classes; Server %rjava% pause cls goto menu :se cls title Error echo You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try runing it. pause cls goto menu :er cls title Error echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type echo in are correct. pause cls goto menu :e cls exit :cjc if exist "%pro%_06%jac%" (goto sjc) else (goto cjc2) :cjc2 if exist "%pro%_07%jac%" (goto sjc2) else (goto cjc3) :cjc3 if exist "%pro%_08%jac%" (goto sjc3) else (goto cjc4) :cjc4 if exist "%pro%_09%jac%" (goto sjc4) else (goto cjc5) :cjc5 if exist "%pro%_10%jac%" (goto sjc5) else (goto cjc6) :cjc6 if exist "%pro2%%jac%" (goto sjc6) else (goto cjc7) :cjc7 if exist "%pro%%jac%" (goto sjc7) else (goto cjc8) :cjc8 if exist "%pro%_01%jac%" (goto sjc8) else (goto cjc9) :cjc9 if exist "%pro%_02%jac%" (goto sjc9) else (goto cjc10) :cjc10 if exist "%pro%_03%jac%" (goto sjc10) else (goto cjc11) :cjc11 if exist "%pro%_04%jac%" (goto sjc11) else (goto cjc12) :cjc12 if exist "%pro%_05%jac%" (goto sjc12) else (goto je) :sjc set javac="%pro%_06%jac%" goto c2 :sjc2 set javac="%pro%_07%jac%" goto c2 :sjc3 set javac="%pro%_08%jac%" goto c2 :sjc4 set javac="%pro%_09%jac%" goto c2 :sjc5 set javac="%pro%_10%jac%" goto c2 :sjc6 set javac="%pro2%%jac%" goto c2 :sjc7 set javac="%pro%%jac%" goto c2 :sjc8 set javac="%pro%_01%jac%" goto c2 :sjc9 set javac="%pro%_02%jac%" goto c2 :sjc10 set javac="%pro%_03%jac%" goto c2 :sjc11 set javac="%pro%_04%jac%" goto c2 :sjc12 set javac="%pro%_05%jac%" goto c2 :cj if exist "%pro%_06%jav%" (goto sj) else (goto cj2) :cj2 if exist "%pro%_07%jav%" (goto sj2) else (goto cj3) :cj3 if exist "%pro%_08%jav%" (goto sj3) else (goto cj4) :cj4 if exist "%pro%_09%jav%" (goto sj4) else (goto cj5) :cj5 if exist "%pro%_10%jav%" (goto sj5) else (goto cj6) :cj6 if exist "%pro2%%jav%" (goto sj6) else (goto cj7) :cj7 if exist "%pro%%jav%" (goto sj7) else (goto cj8) :cj8 if exist "%pro%_01%jav%" (goto sj8) else (goto cj9) :cj9 if exist "%pro%_02%jav%" (goto sj9) else (goto cj10) :cj10 if exist "%pro%_03%jav%" (goto sj10) else (goto cj11) :cj11 if exist "%pro%_04%jav%" (goto sj11) else (goto cj12) :cj12 if exist "%pro%_05%jav%" (goto sj12) else (goto je) :sj set java="%pro%_06%jav%" goto r2 :sj2 set java="%pro%_07%jav%" goto r2 :sj3 set java="%pro%_08%jav%" goto r2 :sj4 set java="%pro%_09%jav%" goto r2 :sj5 set java="%pro%_10%jav%" goto r2 :sj6 set java="%pro2%%jav%" goto r2 :sj7 set java="%pro%%jav%" goto r2 :sj8 set java="%pro%_01%jav%" goto r2 :sj9 set java="%pro%_02%jav%" goto r2 :sj10 set java="%pro%_03%jav%" goto r2 :sj11 set java="%pro%_04%jav%" goto r2 :sj12 set java="%pro%_05%jav%" goto r2 :je cls title Error echo You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0. Go to Mod Taharok's tutorial echo on the Moparscape Tuturoials section for step-by-step instructions echo link to download the newest JDK Update. pause cls goto menu :sl cls echo Ran Server at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Server was run using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Thank-you for using Mod Taharok's 'Perfect' Compiler! :) >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto r5 :sl2 cls echo Ran Server at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Server was run using %java%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Thank-you for using Mod Taharok's 'Perfect' Compiler! :) >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto r6 :cl cls echo Compiled Java files at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Java files were compiled using %javac%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Thank-you for using Mod Taharok's 'Perfect' Compiler! :) >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto c5 :cl2 cls echo Compiled Java files at %time% and on %date%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Java files were compiled using %javac%. >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo Thank-you for using Mod Taharok's 'Perfect' Compiler! :) >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto c4 :reset cls echo Resetting the Compiler's Logs... pause del "Compile Logs.txt" echo ----------Compiler Logs---------- >> "Compile Logs.txt" echo. >> "Compile Logs.txt" goto menu[/code]
How to make your server avaliable to others to play
and hamachi is also an option its very simple download hamachi at http://hamachi.cc/download/ (its safe) then look for a button thats round and has circle in it make the name of your server (i dont recomend caps) eg. mine server hamachi networks are nirvanapkscape1-10 pass is simply 123 (most servers have that because its easy) and also make the networks with numbers at the end start off with 1-10 then as it gets popular and the networks get full you might have to make more just click on that button with the tiangle in it and press "make a new network" option and just do what you did before)
Starting up your server
So after you got a no-ip or hamachi double click the "runserver.bat" file minimize what pops up then open moparscape put in your username you want for you owner acc (make it owner "something" or some related to the server so when people see your username they presume its the owner) DONT DONT CHANGE THE IP ALREADY IN THE IP BAR (127.0.0.1) because if you have you own server running it will just log you in your own server
Making you account the "OWNER"
then open the source folder and look for the characters folder then open it and look for the account you just logged on as the owner (YOU MUST BE LOGGED OUT FOR THIS BIT) double click on your name then change the part near the top where it should say "player rights = 0" change your player rights to 3 now you are the owner (you can ban, kick and ipban [::ipban (username) ::ban (username) ::kick (username) you can just type this in the chat box])
How to advertise your server AND THE RULES (VERY IMPORTANT TO FOLLOW!!!!)
Go to [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,50.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,50.0.html[/url] and make a new topic
and simply follow all these rules stated below (Thanks God of Ikiliki for these rules or the forum would be a mess ;))
These are the basic principles that everyone must follow or their topic will be deleted immediatly:
First of all, DO NOT SPAM IN ANY TOPICS! NO TAGS IN THE NAME! (IE, [Ham] or [pass]) Never flame or discourage someone under ANY circumstance. The title should ONLY be the server name. Do not use '1337', use only whatever language you are acustomed to. You must follow my layout, or loose your topic. The Layout will be not in Center Tags! You can ONLY advertise your own server, not someone else's.
Here is the layout you have to follow: Do NOT Delete the tags!
[b]Server Name: [/b][i] Name of Your Server here[/i]
[b]Server IP: [/b][i] IP of Your Server here[/i]
[b]Server Port: [/b][i] Port of Your Server here[/i]
[b]Hamachi: [/b][i] Yes/No[/i] (If its yes add the Pass/Name)
[b]Online Status:[/b][i] Status of Your Server here[/i] (You can delete this)
[b]Server Features: [/b][i] Features of Your Server here[/i]
[b]Server Staff: [/b][i] Staff of Your Server here[/i]
[b]Server Pictures: [/b] [i] Pictures of Your Server here[/i]
If these rules are not kept, you topic will be locked. If you complain, you will be warned/moderated/muted/banned. These rules WILL be kept.
Here are the rules and guidelines for both Moparisthebest.com and Moparscape.org.
1. We are not anti-leech. If you respect our community and our ideas, feel free to ask questions and they will be kindly answered if you follow other rules. Answer to questions that others ask if you know the answer or remain silent! 2. We don't talk about things we don't know. This is informative, not misinformative community. 3. We don't make spelling mistakes on purpose. We use "you" not "u", we use "why" not "y" etc. 4. We don't make posts that contain unuseful information. Posts like "cool", "lol", "yeah" and "I agree" don't contain anything useful for others. We are not fans of off topic, unless it contains something smart or funny. Most of things spammers find funny are actually not funny at all. 5. We don't "bump" or double post. 6. We respect each other and other communities. We don't flame each other or other communities. We don't fight on the forums. 7. We don't advertise other sites or communities unless we ask and receive permission to and from moparisthebest. We don't post links to sites that are not in safe sites list on moparisthebest.com main page. 8. We don't care about post count alone. If someone has high post count and most of it is spam, we hate him. If someone has high post count with informative posts, we love him. The higher count, the more we hate/love him. 9. We don't talk about "rep" ever, whether you are asking for it or saying that you have given it. 10. DO NOT post or upload any copyrighted materials, ie deobs, clients or any other sort (however if you were to link to a file that was uploaded somewhere else or post code in the pasteBin, well, I would have no control over that right? ) 11. We don't sell anything on these forums with the exception of SCAR scripts. 12. We never have misleading links in your signatures. If your signature says www.google.com, we expect it to take us to google.com. 13. Nothing to do with private servers belongs on moparisthebest.com, use moparisthebest.com for these things.
If any of these rules have been broken, then you will be punished. So please, just follow our rules.
[glow=red,2,300]~NiRvAnA~[/glow]
PLEASE COMMENT/COMPLIMENT THIS TOOK QUITE A LONG TIME TO MAKE THIS POST!

item.title: Read this if ur starting server VERY HELPFUL!
item.dc:creator: @Nirvana.Marijuana Nirvana.Marijuana
item.description:
@Nirvana.Marijuana wrote:

Hey Guys,

I can help you guys but not with errors or adding thing or major coding but if you want to start a server download a source from http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html (fr33sc4p2 pkz, pimpscape, phonescape, project 16 are good sources [sources are the files you need to run your server])

then follow this guide http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,37596.0.html [glow=red,2,300]BUT[/glow]
dont put in what the tuturial says when your editing file “compile.bat” instead clear whats already there and replace it with this:

:: ::
:: All of the following code is © Copywrited 2006-2007, ::
:: Grene Penguin Entertainment. ::
:: ::
::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

@echo off
if exist “C:\Program Files (x86)” set programfiles=C:\Program Files (x86)
set pro=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0
set pro2=%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0
set jac=\bin\javac.exe
set jav=\bin\java.exe
:co1
set b=0
set t=7
goto co2
:co2
color %b%%t%
:menu
cls
title The Perfect Compiler version 1.7
echo Please choose an option below to do that function.
echo Keep posted on the Moparscape Tutorials section for
echo any updates that I post.
echo.
echo c - Compile your server.
echo r - To Run your server.
echo e - To exit out of the program.
echo color - Change the Text and Backround colors of this compiler.
echo reset - Resets your Compiler Logs.
echo.
echo.
set /p c=Option:
if %c%==c goto c
if %c%==C goto c
if %c%==r goto r
if %c%==R goto r
if %c%==color goto color
if %c%==Color goto color
if %c%==COLOR goto color
if %c%==reset goto reset
if %c%==Reset goto reset
if %c%==RESET goto reset
if %c%==e goto e
if %c%==E goto e
if %c%==* goto er
goto er
:color
cls
echo Would you like to change the backround color, change
echo the text color, or reset it to default?
echo.
echo back - Change the backround color.
echo text - Change the text color.
echo def - Change all colors back to default.
echo.
echo.
set /p color=Option:
if %color%==back goto back
if %color%==BACK goto back
if %color%==text goto text
if %color%==TEXT goto text
if %color%==def goto co1
if %color%==DEF goto co1
if %color%==* goto er
goto er
:back
cls
echo Please select a color to change the backround to:
echo.
echo black
echo white
echo red
echo yellow
echo green
echo blue
echo purple
echo.
echo.
set /p back=Color:
if %back%== black (set b=0)
if %back%== white (set b=7)
if %back%== red (set b=4)
if %back%== yellow (set b=6)
if %back%== green (set b=2)
if %back%== blue (set b=1)
if %back%== purple (set b=5)
goto co2
:text
cls
echo Please select a color to change the text to:
echo.
echo black
echo white
echo red
echo yellow
echo green
echo blue
echo purple
echo.
echo.
set /p back=Color:
if %back%== black (set t=0)
if %back%== white (set t=7)
if %back%== red (set t=4)
if %back%== yellow (set t=6)
if %back%== green (set t=2)
if %back%== blue (set t=1)
if %back%== purple (set t=5)
goto co2
:c
cls
title Compiler
goto cjc
:c2
if exist src (goto cl) else (goto c3)
:c3
if exist *.java (goto cl2) else (goto ce)
:c4
%javac% -cp . *.java
echo Files Compiled Successfully!
pause
cls
goto menu
:c5
%javac% -cp . .\src*.java
echo Files Compiled Successfully!
pause
move .\src*.class .\classes
cls
goto menu
:ce
cls
echo You need to have Java files for this Compiler to Compile.
pause
cls
goto menu
:r
cls
title Runserver
goto cj
:r2
set rjava=%java% -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
cls
goto r3
:r3
if exist .\classes\server.class (goto sl2) else (goto r4)
:r4
if exist .\server.class (goto sl) else (goto se)
:r5
%rjava%
pause
cls
goto menu
:r6
set rjava=
set rjava=%java% -cp .;./classes; Server
%rjava%
pause
cls
goto menu
:se
cls
title Error
echo You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the
echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try runing it.
pause
cls
goto menu
:er
cls
title Error
echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type
echo in are correct.
pause
cls
goto menu
:e
cls
exit
:cjc
if exist “%pro%_06%jac%” (goto sjc) else (goto cjc2)
:cjc2
if exist “%pro%_07%jac%” (goto sjc2) else (goto cjc3)
:cjc3
if exist “%pro%_08%jac%” (goto sjc3) else (goto cjc4)
:cjc4
if exist “%pro%_09%jac%” (goto sjc4) else (goto cjc5)
:cjc5
if exist “%pro%_10%jac%” (goto sjc5) else (goto cjc6)
:cjc6
if exist “%pro2%%jac%” (goto sjc6) else (goto cjc7)
:cjc7
if exist “%pro%%jac%” (goto sjc7) else (goto cjc8)
:cjc8
if exist “%pro%_01%jac%” (goto sjc8) else (goto cjc9)
:cjc9
if exist “%pro%_02%jac%” (goto sjc9) else (goto cjc10)
:cjc10
if exist “%pro%_03%jac%” (goto sjc10) else (goto cjc11)

cls
title Error
echo You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0. Go to Mod Taharok’s tutorial
echo on the Moparscape Tuturoials section for step-by-step instructions
echo link to download the newest JDK Update.
pause
cls
goto menu
:sl
cls
echo Ran Server at %time% and on %date%. >> “Compile Logs.txt”

:sl2

:reset

echo Resetting the Compiler’s Logs…
pause
del “Compile Logs.txt”
echo ----------Compiler Logs---------- >> “Compile Logs.txt”
echo. >> “Compile Logs.txt”
goto menu[/code]

How to make your server avaliable to others to play

and hamachi is also an option its very simple download hamachi at http://hamachi.cc/download/ (its safe) then look for a button thats round and has circle in it make the name of your server (i dont recomend caps) eg. mine server hamachi networks are nirvanapkscape1-10 pass is simply 123 (most servers have that because its easy) and also make the networks with numbers at the end start off with 1-10 then as it gets popular and the networks get full you might have to make more just click on that button with the tiangle in it and press “make a new network” option and just do what you did before)

Starting up your server

So after you got a no-ip or hamachi double click the “runserver.bat” file minimize what pops up then open moparscape put in your username you want for you owner acc (make it owner “something” or some related to the server so when people see your username they presume its the owner) DONT DONT CHANGE THE IP ALREADY IN THE IP BAR (127.0.0.1) because if you have you own server running it will just log you in your own server

Making you account the “OWNER”

then open the source folder and look for the characters folder then open it and look for the account you just logged on as the owner (YOU MUST BE LOGGED OUT FOR THIS BIT) double click on your name then change the part near the top where it should say “player rights = 0” change your player rights to 3 now you are the owner (you can ban, kick and ipban [::ipban (username) ::ban (username) ::kick (username) you can just type this in the chat box])

How to advertise your server AND THE RULES (VERY IMPORTANT TO FOLLOW!!!)

Go to http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,50.0.html and make a new topic

and simply follow all these rules stated below (Thanks God of Ikiliki for these rules or the forum would be a mess ;))

These are the basic principles that everyone must follow or their topic will be deleted immediatly:

First of all, DO NOT SPAM IN ANY TOPICS!
NO TAGS IN THE NAME! (IE, [Ham] or [pass])
Never flame or discourage someone under ANY circumstance.
The title should ONLY be the server name.
Do not use ‘1337’, use only whatever language you are acustomed to.
You must follow my layout, or loose your topic.
The Layout will be not in Center Tags!
You can ONLY advertise your own server, not someone else’s.

Here is the layout you have to follow:
Do NOT Delete the tags!

Server Name: Name of Your Server here

Server IP: IP of Your Server here

Server Port: Port of Your Server here

Hamachi: Yes/No (If its yes add the Pass/Name)

Online Status: Status of Your Server here (You can delete this)

Server Features: Features of Your Server here

Server Staff: Staff of Your Server here

Server Pictures:
Pictures of Your Server here

If these rules are not kept, you topic will be locked. If you complain, you will be warned/moderated/muted/banned. These rules WILL be kept.

Here are the rules and guidelines for both Moparisthebest.com and Moparscape.org.

  1. We are not anti-leech. If you respect our community and our ideas, feel free to ask questions and they will be kindly answered if you follow other rules. Answer to questions that others ask if you know the answer or remain silent!
  2. We don’t talk about things we don’t know. This is informative, not misinformative community.
  3. We don’t make spelling mistakes on purpose. We use “you” not “u”, we use “why” not “y” etc.
  4. We don’t make posts that contain unuseful information. Posts like “cool”, “lol”, “yeah” and “I agree” don’t contain anything useful for others. We are not fans of off topic, unless it contains something smart or funny. Most of things spammers find funny are actually not funny at all.
  5. We don’t “bump” or double post.
  6. We respect each other and other communities. We don’t flame each other or other communities. We don’t fight on the forums.
  7. We don’t advertise other sites or communities unless we ask and receive permission to and from moparisthebest. We don’t post links to sites that are not in safe sites list on moparisthebest.com main page.
  8. We don’t care about post count alone. If someone has high post count and most of it is spam, we hate him. If someone has high post count with informative posts, we love him. The higher count, the more we hate/love him.
  9. We don’t talk about “rep” ever, whether you are asking for it or saying that you have given it.
  10. DO NOT post or upload any copyrighted materials, ie deobs, clients or any other sort (however if you were to link to a file that was uploaded somewhere else or post code in the pasteBin, well, I would have no control over that right? )
  11. We don’t sell anything on these forums with the exception of SCAR scripts.
  12. We never have misleading links in your signatures. If your signature says www.google.com, we expect it to take us to google.com.
  13. Nothing to do with private servers belongs on moparisthebest.com, use moparisthebest.com for these things.

If any of these rules have been broken, then you will be punished. So please, just follow our rules.

[glow=red,2,300]~NiRvAnA~[/glow]

PLEASE COMMENT/COMPLIMENT THIS TOOK QUITE A LONG TIME TO MAKE THIS POST!

Read full topic
item.source: Read this if ur starting server VERY HELPFUL!
